snippet: GRUNWALD--Ilse. On February 3, 2016 at 93 years of age, Ilse Grunwald died peacefully at home surrounded by her loving family. Born May 11, 1922 in Ludwigshafen, Ilse escaped Nazi Germany at the age of 16 and after a year in England, arrived in NYC, December 23, 1939. Together with her mother, father, and brother, she started a small watch import firm, the J. Kalberman Co. After the war ended her new husband Ernest joined the firm and together they grew the business which eventually became Belair Time Corp., a thriving private label watch manufacturer. A fierce and savvy businesswoman, Ilse was devoted to growing her company and her beautiful family. A loving mother to Elaine and Alan. Cherished daughter, wife, sister, aunt, cousin, mother-in-law and grandmother. Married for 70 years, she is survived by her husband Ernest. Her strong spirit and loving generosity will never be forgotten. Funeral services will be held on Sunday, February 7 at 9:30am, Freeman Funeral Home, 344 Rt. 9 N., Manalapan, NJ 07726, followed by Interment at Cedar Park Cemetery, Paramus, NJ. Donations to a charity of your choice. 1/3
